ActorTalk: Kurono's operation at the square has been completely wiped out. No one will be interfering with your development plans anymore.
Oh please. Even without me, those little bottom-feeders wouldn't have caused much trouble.
Flourish isn't finished yet. The mission goes on. I'll pry open Hertha's little clique and use them to bait something bigger.
But before that, remember the "dinner" I mentioned earlier? We wrapped up the investigation even faster than I expected.
Are you asking me to dinner?
What, are you going to turn me down?
Let's go, then. There's a restaurant nearby with decent food.
Here's a voucher for the square attractions. Take it.
When the square is completed, be sure to come check it out.
Alright. I'm curious to see what you'll actually make of this half-finished dump.
I hope you won't let me down, Commandant!
